summary: Tension takes many forms, some of them good, some of them bad, and some of them delicious.  In this Big Idea for Only Cold Depths, author Jennifer Estep gets into tension, when to make it… and when to break it.  JENNIFER ESTEP: The Moonlighting curse is real, y’all...
title: The Big Idea: Jennifer Estep

summary: Some thoughts on those I've known who've stood out because of their selfless kindness
title: A Meditation on Nice People

summary:
The German police have successfully deanonymized at least four Tor users.  It appears they watch known Tor relays and known suspects, and use timing analysis to figure out who is using what relay. 
Tor has written about this...
title: Law Enforcement Deanonymizes Tor Users

summary: A small note about a photo taken from the top of the New Church (Nieuwe Kerk) in Delft, The Netherlands
title: A View from Above
